title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: You heard it right. Now playing games are not just for fun; they can let you earn real rewards. With IndiGG, you can play your favourite games like Axie Infinity, Skyweaver, Ev.io etc and start earning secondary income. If you haven't checked them already, do it now by joining their communities below.Tg: https://t.me/theindiggTwitter: https://twitter.com/IndiGG_DAOReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/IndiGG_DAO/Discord: http://discord.com/invite/igg

comments.author: Tanzila420
comments.body: Still now i can,t earning anything like playing games.
